sn36.19:1.1: Atha kho pancakango thapati yenayasma udayi tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam udayim abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
sn36.19:1.2: “kati nu kho, bhante udayi, vedana vutta bhagavata”ti?
sn36.19:1.4: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.19:1.5: ima kho, thapati, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata”ti.
sn36.19:1.6: Evam vutte, pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
sn36.19:1.7: “na kho, bhante udayi, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata.
sn36.19:1.10: Yayam, bhante, adukkhamasukha vedana, santasmim esa panite sukhe vutta bhagavata”ti.
sn36.19:2.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma udayi pancakangam thapatim etadavoca:
sn36.19:2.2: “na kho, thapati, dve vedana vutta bhagavata.
sn36.19:2.4: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.19:2.6: Dutiyampi kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
sn36.19:2.7: “na kho, bhante udayi, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata.
sn36.19:2.10: Yayam, bhante, adukkhamasukha vedana, santasmim esa panite sukhe vutta bhagavata”ti.
sn36.19:3.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma udayi pancakangam thapatim etadavoca:
sn36.19:3.2: “na kho, thapati, dve vedana vutta bhagavata.
sn36.19:3.4: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn36.19:3.6: Tatiyampi kho pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
sn36.19:3.7: “na kho, bhante udayi, tisso vedana vutta bhagavata.
sn36.19:3.10: Yayam, bhante, adukkhamasukha vedana, santasmim esa panite sukhe vutta bhagavata”ti.
sn36.19:3.11: Neva sakkhi ayasma udayi pancakangam thapatim sannapetum, na panasakkhi pancakango thapati ayasmantam udayim sannapetum.
sn36.19:3.12: Assosi kho ayasma anando ayasmato udayissa pancakangena thapatina saddhim imam kathasallapam.
sn36.19:4.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam nisidi.
sn36.19:4.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando yavatako ayasmato udayissa pancakangena thapatina saddhim ahosi kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
sn36.19:5.1: “Santameva, ananda, pariyayam pancakango thapati udayissa bhikkhuno nabbhanumodi;
sn36.19:5.2: santanca panananda, pariyayam udayi bhikkhu pancakangassa thapatino nabbhanumodi.
sn36.19:5.3: Dvepi maya, ananda, vedana vutta pariyayena.
sn36.19:5.10: Evam pariyayadesito kho, ananda, maya dhammo.
sn36.19:5.11: Evam pariyayadesite kho, ananda, maya dhamme ye annamannassa subhasitam sulapitam, na samanumannissanti, na samanujanissanti, na samanumodissanti, tesam etam patikankham—bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharissantiti.
sn36.19:5.12: Evam pariyayadesito kho, ananda, maya dhammo.
sn36.19:5.13: Evam pariyayadesite kho, ananda, maya dhamme ye annamannassa subhasitam sulapitam samanumannissanti samanujanissanti samanumodissanti, tesam etam patikankham—samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharissantiti.
sn36.19:6.3: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya …pe…
sn36.19:6.4: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn36.19:6.6: Yam kho, ananda, ime panca kamagune paticca uppajjati sukham somanassam—
sn36.19:6.12: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:7.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:7.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:7.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:7.8: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:8.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:8.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu, vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:8.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:8.8: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:9.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:9.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajano, sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:9.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:9.8: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:10.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:10.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:10.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:10.8: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:11.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:11.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama, patighasannanam atthangama, nanattasannanam amanasikara, ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:11.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:11.8: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:12.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:12.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma, ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:12.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:12.8: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:13.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:13.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma, ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:13.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:13.8: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:14.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:14.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:14.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:14.8: Atthananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:15.1: Katamancananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca?
sn36.19:15.2: Idhananda, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati.
sn36.19:15.3: Idam kho, ananda, etamha sukha annam sukham abhikkantataranca panitataranca.
sn36.19:16.1: Thanam kho panetam, ananda, vijjati yam annatitthiya paribbajaka evam vadeyyum:
sn36.19:16.2: ‘sannavedayitanirodham samano gotamo aha, tanca sukhasmim pannapeti.
sn36.19:16.4: Evamvadino, ananda, annatitthiya paribbajaka evamassu vacaniya:
sn36.19:16.5: ‘na kho, avuso, bhagava sukhanneva vedanam sandhaya sukhasmim pannapeti.
sn36.19:16.6: Yattha yattha, avuso, sukham upalabbhati, yahim yahim, tam tam tathagato sukhasmim pannapeti’”ti.
